title: the "Core Selector" in the Admin UI should pre-select a core
description:
I was trying to use the admin UI, to understand how text was analyzed, but it was confusing (I couldn't find the Analysis page) until I realized I had to use the "Core Selector" to select my core.

I had only one core ... it seems like the Core Selector could easily just pre-select a core (the "one" in my case...).

comments.author: Konstantin Gribov
comments.content: Maybe, parameter /solr/cores[@defaultCoreName] (in xpath notation) from old solr.xml should be somehow added to the new solr.xml parameters.
